messages.messageBody:
sometime this month you will no longer be able to access
3-hajime.com you will have to go to....
http://hajime3.hp.infoseek.co.jp/index.html
please update your bookmarks

shinsengumi M.A...you don't have to understand 100% of the
discussion but I think many of you should skim the following...

http://listserv.uoguelph.ca/cgi-bin/wa?S1=iaido-l
use key words "shinsen" and "Shinsengumi" you may also find people's
names...continue search with those names and so forth...HIGHLY
RECOMMENDED
